# Client Email Templates

> **Status:** âœ… Active  
> **Audience:** Success Team, Marketing, Product  
> **Last Updated:** December 2025

This document contains email templates for client communication during onboarding and the first 30 days. Customize the tone and details to match your team's voice while keeping the core messaging intact.

---

## Template Guidelines

- **Placeholders:** Use `{{placeholder}}` format for dynamic content
- **Tone:** Friendly, professional, encouraging â€” never pushy
- **Length:** Keep emails concise (under 200 words for most)
- **CTA:** Every email should have ONE clear call-to-action

### Common Placeholders

| Placeholder | Example | Notes |
|-------------|---------|-------|
| `{{client_first_name}}` | Sarah | Client's first name |
| `{{brand_name}}` | "Sunrise Coffee" | Brand name in quotes |
| `{{dashboard_link}}` | https://app.postd.com/dashboard | Link to dashboard |
| `{{review_link}}` | https://app.postd.com/approvals | Link to approvals page |
| `{{brand_guide_link}}` | https://app.postd.com/brand-guide | Link to Brand Guide |
| `{{calendar_link}}` | https://app.postd.com/calendar | Link to calendar |
| `{{support_email}}` | support@postd.com | Support email |
| `{{success_manager_name}}` | Alex | Success manager's name |
| `{{trial_days_remaining}}` | 5 | Days left in trial |
| `{{posts_published}}` | 3 | Number of posts published |

---

## 1. Welcome Email (Day 0)

**Trigger:** Immediately after successful signup  
**Goal:** Confirm account creation, set expectations, encourage first login

### Subject Line
> Welcome to POSTD, {{client_first_name}}! ðŸŽ‰ Your brand is ready.

### Body

```
Hi {{client_first_name}},

Welcome to POSTD! Your account for {{brand_name}} is all set up.

We've already started learning your brandâ€”your Brand Guide is ready for you to review and refine.

**Here's what happens next:**

1. **Review your Brand Guide** â€” We extracted your colors, voice, and style. Take 2 minutes to make sure it feels right.

2. **Check out your content** â€” We've generated a 7-day content plan just for you. It's waiting in your dashboard.

3. **Approve your first post** â€” When you're ready, approve a post and watch it go live!

[Review Your Brand Guide â†’]({{brand_guide_link}})

If you have any questions, just reply to this emailâ€”I'm here to help.

Welcome aboard!

{{success_manager_name}}
Your POSTD Success Manager
```

## 2. Content Ready to Review (Day 1-2)

**Trigger:** 24-48 hours after signup, if client hasn't reviewed content  
**Goal:** Remind client that content is waiting, encourage first approval

### Subject Line
> Your first week of content is ready, {{client_first_name}}!

### Body

```
Hi {{client_first_name}},

Your personalized content for {{brand_name}} is ready for review!

We've created 7 days of on-brand posts, all tailored to your voice and style. They're waiting for your approval.

**What's in your content plan:**
- 5 social media posts
- 1 email newsletter draft
- 1 Google Business Profile post

**Takes about 5 minutes to review.**

[Review Your Content â†’]({{review_link}})

Once you approve, we'll handle the restâ€”scheduling, publishing, the whole thing.

Questions? Just reply to this email.

{{success_manager_name}}
```

## 3. Trial Halfway Reminder (Day 3-4)

**Trigger:** Trial user at day 3 or 4  
**Goal:** Remind of trial timeline, celebrate progress, encourage continued use

### Subject Line
> You're halfway through your trial, {{client_first_name}}!

### Body

```
Hi {{client_first_name}},

You're halfway through your 7-day trial with POSTDâ€”and you're doing great!

**Here's what you've accomplished:**
- âœ… Brand Guide created for {{brand_name}}
- âœ… {{posts_published}} post(s) ready or published

**You have {{trial_days_remaining}} days left** to experience everything POSTD can do for your brand.

**Make the most of your trial:**
- Generate more content in Creative Studio
- Connect additional platforms
- Explore the AI Advisor for insights

[Go to Your Dashboard â†’]({{dashboard_link}})

Questions about upgrading? Reply to this email and I'll walk you through your options.

{{success_manager_name}}
```

## 4. Trial Ending Soon (Day 6)

**Trigger:** Trial user on day 6 (24 hours before expiration)  
**Goal:** Create urgency, highlight value delivered, provide clear upgrade path

### Subject Line
> Your POSTD trial ends tomorrow, {{client_first_name}}

### Body

```
Hi {{client_first_name}},

Your 7-day trial with POSTD ends tomorrow.

**Here's what you accomplished:**
- Created a complete Brand Guide for {{brand_name}}
- Generated AI-powered content tailored to your voice
- {{posts_published}} post(s) created or published

**Ready to keep going?**

Upgrade today and you'll:
- Keep all your content and Brand Guide
- Unlock unlimited posts
- Access full analytics and insights

[Upgrade Now â†’]({{dashboard_link}}/billing)

Not ready yet? No problemâ€”reply to this email and let's chat about what's holding you back.

{{success_manager_name}}
```

## 5. Onboarding Incomplete Reminder (Day 2-3)

**Trigger:** Client started onboarding but didn't finish (stuck for 48+ hours)  
**Goal:** Re-engage, offer help, reduce friction

### Subject Line
> Let's finish setting up {{brand_name}}, {{client_first_name}}

### Body

```
Hi {{client_first_name}},

I noticed you started setting up {{brand_name}} on POSTD, but didn't quite finish.

**No worriesâ€”it happens!** You can pick up right where you left off.

[Continue Setup â†’]({{dashboard_link}})

**Stuck on something?** Here are the most common questions:

- **Website scan didn't work?** You can set up your Brand Guide manuallyâ€”it only takes 5 minutes.
- **Not sure what to do next?** Just reply to this email and I'll walk you through it.

We're here to help you get your first post live. Let's make it happen!

{{success_manager_name}}
```

## 7. 30-Day Check-In (Day 28-30)

**Trigger:** 30 days after signup  
**Goal:** Review progress, gather feedback, discuss next steps

### Subject Line
> Your first month with POSTD, {{client_first_name}}

### Body

```
Hi {{client_first_name}},

It's been one month since you joined POSTDâ€”let's celebrate!

**Your 30-day highlights:**
- {{posts_published}} posts created or published
- Brand Guide fully set up for {{brand_name}}
- Content flowing on your connected platforms

**I'd love to hear from you:**
- How's POSTD working for your workflow?
- Is there anything we can do better?
- Any features you'd like to see?

Just reply to this email with your thoughts.

**Want to chat?** [Book a 15-min check-in]({{calendar_booking_link}}) and I'll help you optimize your setup.

Here's to another great month!

{{success_manager_name}}
```

---

## Usage Notes

### When to Customize

- **Industry-specific language:** Adjust examples for client's industry (e.g., "5 coffee shop posts" instead of "5 social media posts")
- **Tone matching:** Some clients prefer more formal language; adjust as needed
- **Success milestones:** Update "accomplishments" sections with actual client data

### When NOT to Customize

- **CTAs:** Keep call-to-action links consistent and clear
- **Core value props:** Don't dilute the POSTD value proposition
- **Urgency messaging:** Keep trial deadline language honest and accurate
